task.title: How to share your project online?
task.shortdesc: When you want certain people to see your project, you can share it online and send them the link.

taskbody.prereq: You have created a new project with a preset artboard or a custom project.

context.p: You will be able to share your project online.

You can easily share your project online, if you want to receive feedback on your design. You can send the link to the people you want to share it with, if you do not want strangers to see your work, nor comment on it.

step.cmd: Navigate to View Settings and choose Design Review.
Navigate to Link Access and choose Only invited people.
Click on the link icon to copy the link.

result.p: As a result after following the steps above you will have shared your project online.

example.p: When you want to receive feedback on your design, you need to share your project online.
